src.training.cca_cross_validation module¶

This module provides methods to run a cross validation for an RCCA estimator.

Example use-case:

python3 src/training/cca_cross_validation.py \
path/to/dir_out \
gw \
path/to/gw_database/almazan/queries/queries.gtp \
path/to/gw_database/almazan/images \
path/to/PHOCNet_statedict
--k_fold=1 \
--model_name=my_RCCA \
--gpu_idx=cuda:0 \
--alphabet=ldp

src.training.cca_cross_validation.cca_run(dims, regs, dset_train, dset_test, net, words, device, logger, alphabet)[source]¶

Cross validation of different hyper parameters for regularised CCA

Parameters

  • dims – dimension paraameters of the CCAs subspace

  • regs – regularization parameters

  • dset_train – training dataset

  • dset_test – test dataset

  • net – a PHOCNet

  • words – lexicon of words

  • device – gpu device to place the PHOCNet on

  • logger – logger of information

  • alphabet – alphabet for PHOC

Returns

word errors and respective configurations in that order

src.training.cca_cross_validation.cross_val(dset_train: src.io.dataloader.DSetPhoc, net, words, device, logger, n_fold=4, alphabet=[<Alphabet.ASCII_LOWER: 1>, <Alphabet.ASCII_UPPER: 2>, <Alphabet.ASCII_DIGITS: 4>])[source]¶

Running cross validation with fixed hyperparameters.

Parameters

  • dset_train – training dataset

  • net – a PHOCNet

  • words – lexicon of words

  • device – gpu device to place the PHOCNet on

  • logger – logger of infomation

  • n_fold – number of folds for the cross validatin

  • alphabet – alphabet for HOC

Returns

the besst cca and the corresponding mean word error

src.training.cca_cross_validation.gather_NC_TRANS_pairs(net, dset, logger, device, n_code_lvl=0, s_batch=1)[source]¶

Gathering the neural codes/ estimated PHOC from a dataset.

Parameters

  • net – a PHOCNet

  • dset – test dataset

  • logger – logger of infromation

  • device – gpu-device to place the PHOCNet on

  • n_code_lvl – level to extract neural codes from (see src.nn.phocnet.PHOCNet.neural_codes())

  • s_batch – size of batch for inference

Returns

neural codes and true transcriptions in that order

src.training.cca_cross_validation.w_err_CCA(cca: src.estimation.cca.RCCAEstimator, n_codes, transcripts)[source]¶

Calculating the number of words, that have been misclassified

Parameters

  • cca – an RCCA estimator

  • n_codes – neural codes/ estimated PHOC

  • transcripts – true transcriptions for respective neural codes

Returns

number of words, that have been misclassified
